Sophie, who stars as Sansa in the hit HBO series, has hinted that there could be some more sibling rivalry when the show returns.

In season seven of Game of Thrones, fans were no doubt gripped as they watched Sansa and her half-brother Jon Snow (played by Kit Harington) argue over how to rule the North.

While Jon was named King in the North, he quickly rode off to see Daenerys Targaryen (Emilia Clarke) and beg her to help fight the Night King (Vladimir Furdik).

When Jon left Winterfell, Sansa took control and it seems like she may take the reigns a little more in the new series.

Speaking of how her character takes on a more powerful role in season eight, Sophie explained: “She’s used Littlefinger for all he has.
title: Game of Thrones season 8 spoilers: Sansa Stark to BETRAY Jon? Star drops HUGE clue

meta_data.description: GAME OF THRONES is not set to return to television screens until next year but Sansa Stark actress Sophie Turner has been treating fans to clues about what they can expect from the eighth and final series.
